ygData.subject: Re: The question
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a great quest item with ext enhancement on it It is called the Blessed Coldain Prayer Shawl it is a tradeskill quest however and takes some time to
ygData.messageBody:
There is a great quest item with ext enhancement on it It is called
the Blessed Coldain Prayer Shawl it is a tradeskill quest however and
takes some time to complete and has the effect of "Zephyr of Brell"
which is 30% extension on your beneficial spells, as a bonus it also
has FT 3 as well. If you plan on getting your trade skills up then it
would be a great piece of gear to get as it is a shoulder item,
shoulders are the hardest piece of gear to upgrade.

http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/item.html?item=11999


\--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Greg" <freechylde@y...> wrote:
> I did remeber the question...
>
> What is the "effect or effects" that I am looking for on gear that
> extends things like KEI or makes temp last longer, for example...
>
> I have an enchanter and cleric and am looking for the right gear to
> have on to make the most of the buffs and such....
>
> Thanks kids...
> BE GOOD
>
> Greg
